page.title: 15Farming
page.content: In our 12 sq.km.block, approximately 6sq.km.is sea and a further 2sq.km. is residential land. This leaves about 4sq.km. for farming.The land is also broken up by roads and natural contours so that small farms are found.{ {Walmer Court Farm,Walmer Was formerly called (Kings Farm) . 650 hectares. Produces P.Y.O. strawberries,raspberries,cereal crops, potatoes, some sheep. {Hill Farm Breeds large white and landrace pigs Sows:110, Boars:9, miscellaneous pigs 542. Barley, Wheat, Oilseed rape. {Wood Hill Farm.(White Farm)} Breeds Large white, landrace and cross bred pigs:Sows:85 Boars:7,Has 600-800 pigs at any time. {Ledgers Dairy Farm}Has 130 cows in milk _ produces some feed.
